name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!
description: Enter a village full of talking, anthropomorphic animals. Find out their secrets. Make friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 810 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 810 MB available space
